title: {Source Name} Record
description: JSON Schema for {Source Name} data records. Replace placeholders with actual source details.

id.description: Primary identifier for the record. Use the source's native ID format.

name.description: Human-readable name or label for the record.

properties.description: Additional source-specific properties. Define nested fields here.

value.description: Numeric value associated with the record.

unit.description: Unit of measurement for the value.

metadata.description: Record metadata including timestamps and provenance.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the record was created.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the last update.

source_version.description: Version of the source database this record came from.
